string-array.name: card_ironclad_desc
string-array.item: Deal 6 damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile
Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat
Deal damage equal to your current Block
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14 damage.
Gain 2 Strength. At the end of the turn, lose 2 Strength.
Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.
Deal 9 damage. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
Deal 14 damage. Strength affects Heavy Blade 3 times.
Deal 6 damage. Deals an additional 2 damage for ALL of your cards containing \"Strike\".
Deal 3 damage to random enemy 3 times.
Deal 4 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Gain 7 Block. Exhaust a random card from your hand.
Draw 1 card. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust
Deal 12 damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
Place a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Block no longer expires at the start of your turn
Draw 3 cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn
Gain 3 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn.
Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 18 damage.
At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.

string-array.name: card_ironclad_desc_upgrade
string-array.item: Deal 8 damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile
Gain 5 Block. Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat
Deal damage equal to your current Block
Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 18 damage.
Gain 2 Strength. At the end of the turn, lose 2 Strength.
Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.
Deal 12 damage. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
Deal 14 damage. Strength affects Heavy Blade 5 times.
Deal 6 damage. Deals an additional 3 damage for ALL of your cards containing \"Strike\".
Deal 3 damage to random enemy 4 times.
Deal 7 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Gain 9 Block. Exhaust a card from your hand.
Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust
Deal 17 damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
Place a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Block no longer expires at the start of your turn
Draw 4 cards. You cannot draw additional cards this turn
Gain 2 Vulnerable. Gain 1 Energy at the start of your turn.
Cost 1 less energy for each time you lose HP in combat. Deal 22 damage.
Innate. At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 card.
